text:
I remember an issue similar to this but cannot find my notes on it. In our
scenario it had something to do with the Teams upgrade process creating an
uninstall registry entry in one of the registry locations. 
HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run or RunOnce
HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run or RunOnce
HKLM\SOFTWARE\WOW6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run or RunOnce 
After the upgrade, the user would log off and back in again and Teams would
uninstall itself.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Teams Uninstalling itself
metadata.email_text_original:

After the upgrade, the user would log off and back in again and Teams would
